title: NPC Collections
description: This asset collection is compatible with "RPG Maker Unite" and offers a selection of 60 character types, including villagers, townspeople, nobles, soldiers, and monks. These assets have been designed to complement the style of "Classic Monsters" (sold separately).
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# NPC Collections (Non-Player Character Collections)" is a collection of graphic materials suitable for "RPG Maker Unite".
<!--text-->
This asset collection is compatible with "RPG Maker Unite" and offers a selection of 60 character types, including villagers, townspeople, nobles, soldiers, and monks. These assets have been designed to complement the style of "Classic Monsters" (sold separately). 

 
・Villagers (18 items in total):
Children (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total
Adults (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total
Elderly (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total
・Townspeople (18 items in total):
Children (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total 
Adults (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total 
Elderly (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total
・Soldiers (6 items in total):
Adults (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total 
・Monks (6 items in total):
Adults (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total
・Noble (6 items in total):
Adults (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total 
Elderly (male and female): 3 color variations each, 6 pieces total

All the above characters are provided with up, down, left, and right walking animations. (6 frames per animation are available).
*Please contact us if there are any character assets you would like to see in the future! We value your feedback and suggestions.
